p: He sums up his dreams in eating daily, having a decent place to sleep, and having a beautiful girlfriend. However, when we discover Denji's troubled past, we understand that even the basics like 'having breakfast every day' are something very precious to him and would genuinely make him happy.
name: Denji

p: Power is a Blood Devil who, like Denji, was summoned to the Public Safety to avoid being killed. Unlike Aki and Makima, she is quite childish, and living with the protagonist ends up bringing out that side in the boy as well.
name: Power

p: Makima is a woman with a mysterious air and appears to be hiding something from her first appearance. When offering the job of a hunter to Denji, she demands that he be her pet, and the boy accepts such a condition.
name: Makima

p: Aki is a Public Safety Hunter who was initially assigned by Makima to take care of and guide Denji in his new job. Aki is part of Makima's Fourth Division Special Squad and earned this position through excellent job performance, having a contract with the Fox Devil.
name: Aki Hayakawa

p: Another member of the Public Sector, she was Aki's first partner. Alongside the boy, she shared some moments, and they both developed a friendship and trust. Himeno wears an eyepatch over her right eye, due to her pact with the Ghost Devil, which, in exchange for her eye, allows the hunter to use one of its arms anywhere.
name: Himeno
abilities: Ghost Control, Summoning a Ghost Arm

p: Kishibe is the strongest Devil Hunter in the organization. He is older than the others and has some scars on his face. At a certain point, he ends up training Denji and Power, causing the two to try to hit him, but as he is highly skilled, the duo realizes that it's an impossible task.
name: Kishibe

p: It is not known which devil Kobeni has a contract with, but she joined Public Safety in an Experimental Squad led by Makima because she was very poor and wanted to help her family. Kobeni often appears to be quite fearful and cowardly, always hiding or almost panicking when her life is at risk.
name: Kobeni Higashiyama
